org.jclouds.joyent.cloudapi.v6_5
Interface JoyentCloudAsyncApi

public interface JoyentCloudAsyncApi

Provides asynchronous access to JoyentCloud via their REST API.

Author:
Adrian Cole
See Also:
JoyentCloudApi, api doc
